mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee asks that Edmondson refund the tuition for the remaining academic session to student Albert G. Thompson. Thompson had to withdraw for health reasons. He is listed as having returned and graduated in 1870.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Thompson, Albert G.
Edmondson, James K., 1832-1898
Washington College (Lexington, Va.) -- Students
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Note from R. E. Lee to James K. Edmondson, November 15, 1867
